DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Sealed In-office Bleaching Technique : Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , single-blind , controlled trial parallel group equal allocation rate receive either one two treatment , whereas seal technique experimental intervention conventional technique control one . PICO Question : P ( Population ) - Patients dentistry service Federal University Sergipe . I : ( Intervention ) - In-office bleaching use 35 % hydrogen peroxide bleach agent cover customized tray . C : ( Control ) - In-office bleaching use 35 % hydrogen peroxide bleach agent cover without customized tray . O : ( Outcomes ) - Primary outcome : presence tooth sensitivity bleach procedure ; Secondary outcome : Bleaching efficacy . These level sensitivity base pilot study . Thus sample size proportion test ( SigmaStat 3.5 ( Systat Software , Point Richmond , USA ) 17 participant intervention . The bleaching protocol participant place seal envelope , open moment bleaching procedure . In day , participant argue ( verbal scale ) maximum level sensitivity first 24 hour bleach procedure 24th hour . A week bleaching procedure , score base shade guide record . For CIE L*a*b* measurement , ΔE calculate follow equation : ∆E= [ ( ∆L ) 2 + ( ∆a ) 2 + ( ∆b ) 2 ] 1/2 , ∆L = L1 - L0 ; ∆a = a1 - a0 ; e ∆b = b1 - b0 . After shade evaluation , new bleaching procedure , use protocol , perform second appointment measurement tooth sensitivity perform similarly first one . After week second session , shade evaluate . The average ∆E calculate participant two moment re-evaluation , data submit two-way ANOVA ( protocol x moment evaluation ) . Data tooth sensitivity score submit Friedman Man-Whitney test . The multiple-comparison test Tukey use necessary . The number participant present sensitivity session bleaching calculate , percentage participant protocol calculate use Chi-square test . All statistical analysis perform significant level 5 % .
